document_data.name: Tenfold Ironguard
document_data.mainbody: '''''Tenfold ironguard''''' was an improved version of the [[spell]] [[Lesser ironguard|''ironguard'']].
document_data.Effects:
When cast, this spell made ten individuals immune to the touch of non-[[Item enchantment|enchanted]] metal. Metal objects would pass through the recipients as if they were non-corporeal.

''Tenfold ironguard'' was unique to others like it, in that it allowed each recipient to choose a single metal item that would not be affected by the spell's effects.
document_data.History: The title of this spell was inscribed within the ''[[Helm of Helm]]'' and could be cast by utterance of its wearer.
document_data.Components: This spell required [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, along with a small amount of [[iron]] fillings and a single drop of ''[[aqua regia]]''.
